resources.string: Termux was unable to install the bootstrap packages.\n\nCheck your network connection and try again.
Termux can only be installed on the primary user account.
Close down existing ones before creating new.
Click URL to copy or long press to open
No URL found in the terminal.
The Termux:Style add-on is not installed.
Currently only support ARM 64bit Android for DeepCamera development mode
No OpenCL/GPU support on your system, performance/accuracy reduces heavily, use for evaluation only please.
Do you want to start DeepCamera services?

DeepCamera platform is starting...

 
Do you want to use Android Camera for testing? 
It is better to wait for 1-2 minutes for DeepCamera system startup, then tap YES to start the Camera preview demo. 
This application is designed for evaluating DeepCamera platform.
Want to install DeepCamera development environment?

Tap Install to install DeepCamera development environment. 
Will download 742MB data to your external storage, make sure you have wifi connected or will cost your mobile bandwidth. 
Need 2.8GB storage for system installation on your data storage. 
Keep screen on for better wifi signaling please :)
Extracting…\nPlease allow 10-20 minutes to extract DeepCamera system... \nIf it happen to about during this procedure, suggest to remove and install again to have full system successfully setup.
Success: decompress of DeepCamera development environment
